text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Charlotte Amalie | other_name = Taphus | settlement_type = City | total_type = | image_skyline = StThomasHarbor.jpg | image_caption = Charlotte Amalie harbor at night | pushpin_map = USA Virgin Islands | pushpin_label_position = Charlotte Amalie | pushpin_map_caption = Location within the United States Virgin Islands | subdivision_name = United States | subdivision_type1 = Territory | subdivision_name1 = United States Virgin Islands | government_footnotes = | government_type = | leader_title = | leader_name = | established_title = | established_date = 1666 | area_magnitude = | area_footnotes = | area_total_sq_mi = | area_water_percent = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_ft = | elevation_max_ft = | elevation_min_ft = | population_as_of = 2020 | population_footnotes = | population_note = | population_total = 14477 | population_density_sq_mi = auto | timezone = AST (UTC-4) | utc_offset = -4 | timezone_DST = | utc_offset_DST = | coordinates = | postal_code_type = VI | postal_code = 00801â€“00804 | area_code = 340 | website = | footnotes = }} Charlotte Amalie is the capital and largest city of the United States Virgin Islands. It has about 15,000 people. The city is on the island of Saint Thomas. Charlotte Amalie is also the home to the Legislature of the U.S. Virgin Islands. title: Charlotte Amalie, U.S. Virgin Islands
